name: csv-data-management
label: CSV Data Management
description: CSV Data management can perform different operations on CSV files like read file, perform deduplication, merge two CSV files, join two CSV files, concat two CSV files and return well formatted dataset

operations.title: Extract Data from Single CSV
operations.description: This action will extract data from CSV based on column names provided. Optionally, User can select an option to deduplicate resultant recordset based on column(s) provided

parameters.title: Column Names
parameters.name: columnNames
parameters.description: Comma separated columns name you want to extract from CSV File
parameters.tooltip: Comma separated columns name you want to extract from CSV File

parameters.title: Deduplicate Values on
parameters.name: deDupValuesOn
parameters.description: Column name you want to use deduplicate data  from CSV File
parameters.tooltip: Column name you want to use deduplicate data  from CSV File

parameters.title: Number of rows to skip
parameters.name: numberOfRowsToSkip
parameters.description: Number of rows you want to skip from top of CSV File. Note first row will be skipped even if it has column names
parameters.tooltip: Number of rows you want to skip from top of CSV File. Note first row will be skipped even if it has column names

On Values Matching a Regex.title: Filter on Column
On Values Matching a Regex.name: filterColumnName
On Values Matching a Regex.description: Provide column name which you want to use to filter data
On Values Matching a Regex.tooltip: Provide column name which you want to use to filter data

On Specified Values.title: Filter on Column
On Specified Values.name: filterColumnName
On Specified Values.description: Provide column name which you want to use to filter data
On Specified Values.tooltip: Provide column name which you want to use to filter data

On Specified Values.title: Filter String
On Specified Values.name: filter
On Specified Values.tooltip: Comma separated list of values on which you want to filter data. Values should be present in column metioned above

parameters.title: Convert recordset into batch
parameters.name: recordBatch
parameters.description: If set, will return rows as recordSet in list of 20 batches otherwise complete result in a single recordSet
parameters.tooltip: If set, will return rows as recordSet in list of 20 batches otherwise complete result in a single recordSet

parameters.title: Save as attachment
parameters.name: saveAsAttachment
parameters.description: If set, the resultant recordSet will be saved as compressed attachment in CSV format
parameters.tooltip: If set, the resultant recordSet will be saved as compressed attachment in CSV format

operations.title: Merge and Extract Data from two CSV
operations.description: This action will extract data from CSV based on column names provided, by merging two CSV file. Optionally, User can select an option to deduplicate resultant recordset based on column(s) provided

parameters.title: First File Column Names
parameters.name: file1_column_names
parameters.description: Comma separated list of columns name you want to extract from CSV File
parameters.tooltip: Comma separated list of columns name you want to extract from CSV File

parameters.title: Number of rows to skip from First File
parameters.name: numberOfRowsToSkipFirst
parameters.description: Number of rows you want to skip from top of CSV File. Note first row will be skipped even if it has column names
parameters.tooltip: Number of rows you want to skip from top of CSV File. Note first row will be skipped even if it has column names

parameters.title: Second File Column Names
parameters.name: file2_column_names
parameters.description: Comma separated list of columns name you want to extract from CSV File
parameters.tooltip: Comma separated list of columns name you want to extract from CSV File

parameters.title: Number of rows to skip from Second File
parameters.name: numberOfRowsToSkipSecond
parameters.description: Number of rows you want to skip from top of CSV File. Note first row will be skipped even if it has column names
parameters.tooltip: Number of rows you want to skip from top of CSV File. Note first row will be skipped even if it has column names

parameters.title: Merge on Column
parameters.name: mergeColumnNames
parameters.description: Column name which is common in two files which you want to use to merge data from both files
parameters.tooltip: Column name which is common in two files which you want to use to merge data from both files

parameters.title: Deduplicate Values on
parameters.name: deDupValuesOn
parameters.description: Column name you want to use deduplicate data from CSV File
parameters.tooltip: Column name you want to use deduplicate data from CSV File

operations.title: Convert JSON to CSV File
operations.description: This action will convert given JSON file to a CSV file

JSON.title: JSON Data
JSON.name: json_data
JSON.description: Provide the JSON data that you want to change to CSV
JSON.tooltip: Provide the JSON data that you want to change to CSV

JSON.title: Provide CSV Filename
JSON.name: csvFileName
JSON.description: Provide name for resulant CSV file. This file will be compressed
JSON.tooltip: Provide name for resulant CSV file. This file will be compressed

JSON.title: Record Path
JSON.name: record_path
JSON.description: Specify the Entry Point of the JSON Field, If it is not provided then by default It will convert all the JSON Data to CSV
JSON.tooltip: Specify the Entry Point of the JSON Field, If it is not provided then by default It will convert all the JSON Data to CSV

JSON.title: Additional Fields
JSON.name: meta
JSON.description: Specify the Additional Fields you want to add in the CSV. If more than one Fields are there, Please Provide Fields in a Comma Separated Manner with no spaces. By Default this is set to None meaning no additional Fields will be merged
JSON.tooltip: Specify the Additional Fields you want to add in the CSV. If more than one Fields are there, Please Provide Fields in a Comma Separated Manner with no spaces. By Default this is set to None meaning no additional Fields will be merged

Attachment IRI.title: Provide CSV Filename
Attachment IRI.name: csvFileName
Attachment IRI.description: Provide name for resulant CSV file. This file will be compressed
Attachment IRI.tooltip: Provide name for resulant CSV file. This file will be compressed

File IRI.title: Provide CSV Filename
File IRI.name: csvFileName
File IRI.description: Provide name for resulant CSV file. This file will be compressed
File IRI.tooltip: Provide name for resulant CSV file. This file will be compressed
